name: Hard Day at Monster Farm
description:
Enjoy your time at monster farm! But be careful, they seem to be teleporting a bit..

Made this game within GameJam rules: 72 hours, theme 'Return'. Posting a link to the Unity Project for those who are curious https://drive.google.com/file/d/1lJwBrIK3PThVH5j7l0xhfc5X2szaexLT/view?usp=shari...

I want to thanks some creators since I used their cc0 content:

Music: rezoner

Smoke FX: nyknck

Background art: alexlka

Animals and player art: brackeys
